articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The prime minister responds to an online petition calling for a new election, months after the last poll.
articles.title: Keir Starmer: I'm not surprised some want an election re-run

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Officials say 28 survivors have been found and 17 are missing after the vessel sank near Egypt's Marsa Alam.
articles.title: Egypt launches rescue mission after Red Sea tourist boat sinks

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: In a new filing, Special Counsel Jack Smith says a policy bans the prosecution of a sitting president.
articles.title: Prosecutor asks judge to drop Trump election interference case

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: At least five people died as the storm brought heavy rain, wind and snow over the weekend.
articles.title: Storm Bert: More rain forecast as clean-up begins

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A girl is undergoing surgery and a man, 34, has been left with potentially life-changing injuries.
articles.title: Man arrested after eight-year-old girl shot in Ladbroke Grove

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Aid workers say armed gangs operating within sight of Israeli forces are looting supplies, amid severe shortages.
articles.title: Gangs and 'ultra-violence' blocking south Gaza aid distribution

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Chancellor Rachel Reeves tells the CBI conference she is "not coming back with more borrowing or more taxes".
articles.title: Reeves tells businesses no more tax rises as she defends Budget

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: He says he "can't see anything, I can't read anything, I can't watch anything" after an eye infection.
articles.title: Elton John album on hold because he 'can't see' after eye infection

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Dominique Pelicot, 72, is facing the maximum sentence for rape in a case that has horrified France.
articles.title: Prosecutors demand 20-year jail sentence for Dominique Pelicot

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: BBC journalist Hazel Martin was told she had liver fibrosis and must go teetotal or she could die.
articles.title: ‘At 31, I was told if I didn’t stop drinking, I could die’
